title: Permanently banned
body: I have been permanently banned for toxic behavior. There is no questioning I have been toxic. But I will do anything for this account back. If riot can find it in their hearts to grant me a chance to be unbanned I would be forever grateful and never be toxic again. In my previous game I was being toxic to a person being severely toxic to other people. I was trying to stand up for people, and I notice now that wasn’t the best way to handle the situation.

You'd do anything? Anything but not be toxic, I suppose. Riot figures they've given you enough chances and giving you yet another would be pointless. That's why it's a perma.

I honestly would work to solve the solution of it. While playing on my other account many people are toxic and I have been trying to fix that. I have put forth my hardest effort to become somebody who is not toxic. I know I really don’t deserve an unban, but if they give me one more chance I wouldn’t do anything because I’ve noticed playing without my account is miserable, I just wanna use my skins and climb without being toxic. And while playing on this account i have been on the other side of the toxicity and it is not a good feeling. I just can’t do that to anyone again.
